last_episode_to_air.name: Ten Hours, Forty Minutes
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Casey Anthony trial continues, the defense takes center stage  and the verdict sparks outrage across the country.

name: Casey Anthony: An American Murder Mystery
original_name: Casey Anthony: An American Murder Mystery
overview: An examination of the Casey Anthony case. The 22-year-old Florida woman was accused of the murder of her 2-year-old daughter, Caylee. At trial, she was convicted of four lesser charges of providing false information to a police officer, but found not guilty of murder, child abuse and manslaughter.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: Lies, betrayal, and murder. Casey Anthony insists that her two-year-old daughter Caylee was abducted by the nanny, but investigators soon discover the child has been missing for 31 days. Where is Caylee?

episodes.name: A Shallow Grave
episodes.overview: As the Casey Anthony trial begins, the defense unleashes shocking allegations and the prosecution reveals their theory of how Caylee died.

episodes.name: Ten Hours, Forty Minutes
episodes.overview: As the Casey Anthony trial continues, the defense takes center stage  and the verdict sparks outrage across the country.
